#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<climits>
#include<set>
using namespace std;
long long fastPower(long long base,long long power,long long M)
{
    if(power==0)
       return 1;
    if(power==1)
    return base;
    long long halfn=fastPower(base,power/2,M);
    if(power%2==0)
        return ( halfn * halfn ) % M;
    else
        return ( ( ( halfn * halfn ) % M ) * base ) % M;
}
int main()
{ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
int t;
long long int n;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
cin>>n;
cout<<fastPower(2,n-1,1000000007)<<"\n";
}
return 0;
}
